text: â€˜He mora pratipalaka! Tumiye'i moka raajatba dana karaicha arau saponara byakhya siksa dicha. He akasasamuha arau prthiraira srasta! Tumiye'i prthirai arau akhiraatata mora abhibharaka. Tumi moka muchalima arasthata mutyu pradana karaa arau moka satkarmaparaayanasakalara antarbhukta karaaâ€™
